data.text:
Jessica Morris: personal life and boyfriend

Moving on to her personal life, she has kept her private affairs away from the media these days. The 41-year-old (as of 2021) appears to be dating a guy named Chris Lennon according to her Instagram page. She has shared the cozy images of her on the social media platforms of her captioning my man in a couple of pictures. Although there is not much information about her man, it seems that they share a beautiful relationship with each other.

However, she had previously in fact dated Rib Hillis, but it ended with an ugly split. After that, she has been single and has never been exposed for her relationship. On the other hand, Hillis married world champion and former Dancing with the Stars pro Elena Grineko.

Subtitle : Jessica and Chris Lennon

Source : Instagram

Jessica Morris: Net Worth and Social Media Profiles

Talking about her income, she has been earning a lot of fortune from her acting career. She therefore has a net worth estimated to be around $4 million from her work in the entertainment industry. Additionally, she has named a few properties in her name, including her home worth over $1 million. She also loves to wear a designer dress from Milan, Dior and many more.

He has verified and personal accounts on different social media platforms. On Instagram she has an account @ jessicamorris01 with 17.7k followers. She has @Jessicaamorris Twitter accounts with over 3.2k followers.

Jessica Morris: body measurements

The beautiful actress has a slim and attractive figure measuring 31-24-33 inches in chest, waist and hips respectively. The perfect body of her stands at a height of 5 feet 6 inches or 1.68 meters and weighs around 54 kg. She has a blonde hair color with blue eyes.
